statements: DELETE FROM bug_reports WHERE resolved = FALSE AND reported_by_user_id = '98765432-1234-5678-9123-456789123456';
DELETE FROM bug_reports WHERE bug_id = 100 AND reported_by = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 500 AND feedback_rating < 3;
DELETE FROM GameQualityMetrics WHERE metric_id = 100 AND value > 50.00;
DELETE FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 456 AND feedback_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM game_stats WHERE total_players < 100 AND average_rating > 4.5;
